name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked as spam and excluded. socks: What a douche. (reported by Zefiel, DeimosRising, afastidioushat)

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, apocowarg, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, tibcoolbreeze, jfenserty, rowboat, unkle_bob, thunderbat, Bourbonsamurai, Jhunter, trisha, ActualTaunt, NDCaesar, Fermatprime, atticusonline, sdskyle, aHatOfPig, mystkmanat, ravindra108, mountain, Zem, GunsOfRay, bixschmix, Rapid_Roy, Doc_Rostov, Ryabovsky, afvbs)

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Boyd, gnjdfsgk, ovenface)

name: andrew_
text:
It really bothers me when people mark lame comments as spam.

Like a lot of the stuff retardo used to post. Sure it was ridiculous and most of it was worthy of several lames, but spam? Did it really offend people that much to read someone musing about Onstad's orientation?

I've said this before but it's worth repeating as it's probably the golden rule of achewood: No one should be a cock to a stranger, ever.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by salvagebar, Brosaurus, Chromancer)

name: achilleselbow
text: Or maybe Lame 2: Electric Boogaloo?

name: gouldgonewild
text: Havana Nights

name: atticusonline
text: lost in new york

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yeah, that sounds like the truth.

name: theryuujin
text: But now I have no idea what the original comment was...and am such as forlorn that I will never know.

name: rowboat
text: Well, theryuujin, allow me to blow you away by dropping some knowledge. You can click on the word "comment" in the sentence ("The comment left by socks....") and find out what all the fuss was about. Sorry in advance for the anticlimax.

name: theryuujin
text: sometimes you think you want things that you don't actually want

name: semiquaver
text:
If we could call the cops on retardo, that's what we oughta be doing. Getting him off the comments page is good enough, until someone wakes up and bans him.

It is people like that what causes serious damage to gay peoples such as myself who actually want to talk about gay themes in achewood. Or want to ever have anyone respect them again.

Wait...is retardo still around, even?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
good thing you only said his name twice. doing so three times summons him.

DO NOT SUMMON HIM

name: soticoto
text:
Nope... thas me.
Discussing closeted homoerotic behaviour summons Retardo.

name: salvagebar
text: Indeed, brother, PREACH IT. I miss asherdan and retardo. I've raised my "Lame Limit" into the triple digits precisely because I want to see what everyone has to say.

name: zefiel
text:
Yeah, you don't know what was going on with Socks. Wouldn't know unless you had been around when Acheworld came out. Unless you had been 'first' in a way.

But yes, I can't defend the use of XD Man I was severely retarded. Now I'm just bitter.

name: rowboat
text: And I feel stupid for even posting that preachy, pointless bullshit in the first place. I was younger then. Now we're all chilled out and miserable, I guess.

name: sp1derbaby
text: And fatter and balder and...

name: achilleselbow
text: I dunno man, I think a comment that does nothing except brag about being first resides somewhere on the fine line between spammery and plain idiotry. Kind of like a virus has some of the characteristics of living things.

name: nabeel84
text: I always took Cornelius as the kind of guy who would be smooth with the ladies.

name: petitegitan
text: He probably comes at them with too many words.  Pick-ups cannot be confusing.

name: chaesar
text: Hey you try reciting Victor Hugo over 120 decibels of Ludacris.

name: deancain29
text: amen!

name: shogun
text: Yes.

name: spinynorman
text:
Normal dudes gotta have talking-level noise to pull off charming.

I can rattle my saber all I want, but it ain't never gonna see battle if the lady I espy can't hear my dozens of puns about her stiletto heels.

name: heccibiggs
text: Tell me one. Right now. Imagine I'm wearing stiletto heels.

name: cousinted
text: Well, there go my plans for a new stage adaptation of Les Miserables.

name: kilroywashere
text:
"I wonder by my troth, what thou and I
Did, till we loved? were we not wean'd till then?
But suck'd on country pleasures, childishly?
Or snorted we in the Seven Sleepers' den ? "

name: soticoto
text: People don't really, actually, seriously use pick-up lines with full intent to couple.... do they? o_0;

name: deusoma
text: This is a truth. It happens. Whether or not they are ever at all successful is an entirely different story.

name: soticoto
text: Natural selection, I guess.

name: saru
text: I've always imagined him being quite smooth, but not the right flavor of smooth for a dive bar named Smoke.

name: achilleselbow
text: He is. These are just the wrong kinds of ladies.

name: charchar
text:
Love is the fart
of every heart
That when held in, doth pain the host
But when released, pains other most

-=Sir John Suckling=-
Cavalier poet of Cromwellian England.

name: dejavroom
text: How this got only 2 chubbies is beyond me.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: shh----it's ten now.

name: dybrar
text: Still only 17. We can do a lot better around here, people!

name: dougthehead
text: It's the venue.  Cornelius is used to working his stuff in classier joints.  Also, the dude has a serious lack of mane.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Man, I got mane. I am naturally a guy who grows such as a mane.

name: riazm
text:
"Get Primal"

Primal is capitalised.

name: biddlebubbly
text: Roll call: Who else looked up porpentine? Make me feel less stupid.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Guilty. But whatever, it's just one of those words that Shakespeare made up. what a dick.

name: comrade_tom
text: Dissing on Shakespeare is like having an eminem poster, its acceptable when youre 13 or so, beyond that its hella crass.

name: heccibiggs
text: I chubby'd you, hopefully others will do the same in my stead and that one lame will become irrelevant.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: chubbied even though I don't agree with you.

name: pogo
text:
C'mon, it was like hundred of years ago, and the dude heard about this Colonial animal, sort sounded like "porpentine" or summat. Could have been "porcupine," but what's the diff? It's a great allusion to hair sticking straight up from fear, if you bother to read the original passage from Hambone:
I am thy father's spirit,
Doom'd for a certain term to walk the night,
And for the day confined to fast in fires,
Till the foul crimes done in my days of nature
Are burnt and purged away. But that I am forbid
To tell the secrets of my prison-house,
I could a tale unfold whose lightest word
Would harrow up thy soul, freeze thy young blood,
Make thy two eyes, like stars, start from their
spheres,
Thy knotted and combined locks to part
And each particular hair to stand on end,
Like quills upon the fretful porpentine:
But this eternal blazon must not be
To ears of flesh and blood. List, list, O, list!
If thou didst ever thy dear father love--

name: saru
text: Yeah, Shakespeare you dick.

name: rowboat
text: Even worse, I needed to look it up and I didn't. Add to that the fact that I'm at work in a library and I'm sitting approximately four feet from a twenty volume set of the O.E.D. and I'm on the internet, to boot - that means I suck....and I'm still not going to look it up.

name: tourach3
text:
agreed
not looking it up out of principle... i am content with my mediocre intellect

name: semiquaver
text: Sorry mate.  I have read Hamlet and so on.  Which does make me a trifle sad to be honest.

name: spinynorman
text: I remember it from Sandman.

name: hargbarf
text: i just realized that you could end this strip right before the word "down" and it would still make perfect sense.

name: sp1derbaby
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: dasilodavi
text: Sometimes I enjoy the delicious change of pace from the absurd that Cornelius provides.  Other times, like this, I find myself wishing a plague on the english language for the effect of diminishing the vocabulary such that I can read this strip without taking a lunch break and a nap.

name: vondicus
text: Dude does indeed need mane.

name: atticusonline
text: bbcode strikes another victim down cold

name: sargasm
text: "and nor"?  Poor form, Cornelius.

name: gussiejives
text: The Mansons dig mane apparently.  I hope they don't moonlight in that Tull Army.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Pat: Reflections on the Holiday Season.

name: tellumo
text: Pat is exactly the kind of jerk that would try to pass off a concoction of roasted garlic, fake half-and-half, fake sour cream, chicken stock, and Splenda as bearing any resemblance to eggnog.

name: charchar
text: I think I can honestly say I would go for pick-up lines from the Donne-ster, if only to say I left the bar with  a celebrity.

name: tttt2
text: Cornelius is quaking with rage

name: comrade_tom
text:
Fun saber fact. in the Czech Republic when you want to say that you have vomited following too much drink, you can say you have "Thrown a saber".

Just goes to show that country spent waaaaaay too much time under austrian rule.

name: firesign
text: So, being as they look like they're in the Tull Army, I suppose we have to assume that Cornelius has sunk pretty low by this point: Chickenhead Mary is assumedly cross-eyed.

name: firesign
text: fuck DAMMIT i did not mean to use various forms of "assume" 17 times in one post

name: stuart
text: Looks like you just made an ASS out of U.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
ME?

oh, no. that..um...that guy.

name: orvel
text:
Man, for the first time...

Roast Beef is a Dick.

name: orvel
text: I know, I know, it's just the mane talking.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
it is funny. your avicon makes it look like Beef's watching a replay of his life and he's making comments.

rad.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: Look at Beef, all confident and dissing on cornelius's moves when two years ago he thought the best he could do was a transient relationship with an immigrant.

name: handheld
text:
Off with your wiry coronet and show
The hairy diadem which on you doth grow

name: gus
text:
I like how the Smoke is in a dead part of town. Maybe back in the fifties this area was thriving, but now there are just a few warehouses and the Smoke.

It's the only place lit up at 3 A.M. Not even any cars parked out front. The bartender is waiting for the drunks with the lion manes to leave so she can close the damn place and go home.

name: zapatos
text: Mr. Bear isn't so bad at picking up the ladies, its the ladies that are bad at getting picked up by He.

name: carlyle
text:
I thought Cornelius would be a master of the game. Maybe it all went out of him with his wife's passing.

(it can also probably be attributed to times a-changin')

name: asheme
text:
Donne got a lot of bonin in.

Just sayin'
